Streamline your testing process with Test Companion, the complete solution for generating test cases and bug reports.

Test Companion combines the power of its Chrome Extension and Web Platform to revolutionize how QA teams and developers approach software testing. The Chrome Extension captures user interactions as the user tests their application, while the Web Platform processes this data to generate accurate, actionable test cases and bug reports.

With Test Companion, you can transform raw testing data into well-structured test cases and bug reports effortlessly, saving time and reducing manual effort.

How Test Companion Works

Chrome Extension: Recording Made Easy
The Test Companion Chrome Extension captures:
	•	Clicks, inputs, and navigations: Track every interaction in your testing process.
	•	Screenshots: Automatically capture page changes or take manual full-page screenshots.
	•	Real-time logs: View recorded actions in the “Recent Actions” panel. 

Once recording is complete, you can:
	•	Send Data to the Web Platform: Automatically upload recordings using a recording key.
	•	Download Locally: Save recordings manually and upload them to the Web Platform later.

Web Platform: Your Testing Command Center
The Web Platform takes recorded data from the Chrome Extension and transforms it into:
	•	Accurate Test Cases: Customizable, structured test cases with preconditions, steps, and expected results.
	•	Detailed Bug Reports: Context-rich bug reports with screenshots and precise reproduction steps.

Use AI-powered features on the platform to refine test cases, track requirements, and generate automated scripts.


How to use Chrome Extension:
  1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
  2. Pin the extension to your browser for easy access.
  3. Set Up Recording Key: Generate a recording key on the Test Companion Web Platform and add it in the extension settings.
  4. Start Recording: Click the Start button to begin capturing interactions.
  5. Test Your Application: Do your usual testing activities while Test Companion takes care of tracking.
  6. Stop Recording: Click Stop to finish and automatically send your data to the platform (with a valid recording key).
  7. Manual Download: Alternatively, use the Download button to save recordings locally and upload them manually to the Test Companion Web Platform.
  8. Navigate to Test Companion Web Platform: Generate accurate test cases and detailed bug reports in seconds.

Key Features of Test Companion:
Chrome Extension:
	•	Track Interactions: Record clicks, form inputs, navigations, and page changes.
	•	Screenshot Capture: Auto-capture on URL changes or take manual full-page screenshots.
	•	Data Management: Send recordings directly to the Web Platform or download them for manual upload.
	•	Custom Tags: Add names and tags to recordings for easy organization.
	•	Settings Control: Manage recording keys, toggle screenshots, or clear stored data.

Web Platform:
	•	AI-Powered Test Case Generation: Generate structured, accurate test cases instantly.
	•	Comprehensive Bug Reports: Create bug reports enriched with context and screenshots.
	•	Requirement Tracking: Link requirements to recordings for complete traceability.
	•	Automation Ready: Generate automated test scripts from recorded interactions.
	•	Customization Options: Tailor test cases and reports to your style and requirements.


Why Test Companion?
Test Companion isn’t just another testing tool—it’s a solution that redefines software testing. By combining intelligent data capture with powerful automation, it empowers teams to:
	•	Capture Real User Behavior: Record clicks, inputs, navigations, and screenshots with unmatched clarity.
	•	Generate High-Quality Test Cases and Bug Reports: Structured, actionable, and reliable testing artifacts every time.
	•	Streamline Your Workflow: Cut the manual effort and focus on what matters most—quality.



Revolutionize Software Testing with Test Companion

Test Companion redefines how we think about software testing. By combining the simplicity of the Chrome Extension with the powerful features of the Web Platform, it ensures your QA process is faster, smarter, and more effective.

Start recording, analyzing, and generating better testing artifacts today with Test Companion—the ultimate toolkit for Quality Assurance.
